attributes.action: Knight Richard Sbragia the Sunderland 1st Team Manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our club is doing so badly that we need recognitio of the efforts of our manager.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
